summary: Two scientists who are hopeless with the opposite sex experiment with a substance that makes them irresistible to anyone who hears them speak.
cast: Tate Donovan|Sandra Bullock|Mary Mara|Dale Midkiff|Hillary B. Smith|Anne Bancroft|Dylan Baker|Blake Clark|Bruce McCarty|Rebecca Staab|Adrian Paul|Ric Reitz|Steven Burnette|Jordan Baker|Ken Strong|Gary Watkins|Scott Brian Higgs|James Sbardellati|Libby Whittemore|David Baer|Marc Gowan|Esther Huston|Lisa Guerrero|Timothy Martin|Susan Fassig|Rob Cleveland|Kathryn Firago|Jennifer Hale|Victoria Tabaka|David Dwyer|Virgil Beckham|Ann Taylor Boutwell|Edith Ivey|Andra Millian|Chad Governale|Karen Beyer|Barry Hopkins|Chris Jenkins|Lavon Lacey|D. Taylor Loeb|Mary Swafford|Petra Verkaik
title: Poción de amor número 9
